featured.text: In 1871 Moran joined the first US government survey of the Yellowstone region with photographer William Henry Jackson.
Moran’s watercolors—the first color renderings of the area—as well as Jackson’s photos and the survey results were presented to the Congress.

definition.zh_def: 傑克遜，一個常見的姓氏或地名，可能指代多位著名人物或地區。
definition.en_def: Jackson is a common surname or place name, often referring to various notable individuals or locations.
definition.example: Michael Jackson is known as the King of Pop.
